item.title: 寒流加剧，天气警告遍布欧洲

item.title: 洛杉矶居民被发送到手机上的虚假疏散警报吓坏了
item.description: 在南加州遭受灾难性火灾的第三天，一个疏散警报被错误地发送给洛杉矶县的 1000 万居民，20 多分钟后又被撤回，这加剧了紧张局势。【原文：An evacuation alert was mistakenly sent to 10 million Los Angeles County residents and then retracted more than 20 minutes later, adding to tensions as Southern California endured a third day of catastrophic fires.】

item.title: 洛杉矶大火为何如此惨烈
item.description: 尽管消防员奋力控制洛杉矶及周边地区的多处大火，但估计造成的损失已使这场大火成为该地区几十年来最严重的自然灾害。火灾的起因仍在调查中，但近期的天气模式以及该地区独特的环境条件助长了火势的蔓延。以下是大火造成如此严重破坏的原因。【原文：Even as firefighters battled to contain multiple blazes in Los Angeles and the surrounding area, the estimated damages already have made the fires the region’s worst natural disaster in decades. How the fires started remains under investigation, but recent weather patterns, as well as the region’s unique environmental conditions, helped fuel their spread. Here’s what to know about why the fires have been so ruinous.】
